segments.text: Come on , you must tell me everything about him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , he's very tall and handsome .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He has big blue eyes and long blonde hair .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Down to his shoulders . It's beautiful , like gold .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . OK . You'd better tell me what he does .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He's a very creative painter . His paintings sell well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He's quite a patient teacher , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're going to like him . Everybody says he's a nice guy .
segments.speaker: S2
